query:
INSERT INTO packages (name_ar, name_en, description_ar, description_en, price, billing_cycle, customer_limit, message_limit, features, is_active, sort_order, created_at) VALUES 
('الباقة الأساسية', 'Basic Plan', 'باقة مثالية للمشاريع الصغيرة والمتاجر الناشئة', 'Perfect for small businesses and startups', 99, 'monthly', 100, 1000, '{"whatsapp_integration":true,"ai_responses":true,"basic_analytics":true,"product_management":true,"order_management":true,"customer_support":"email","custom_branding":false,"advanced_analytics":false,"api_access":false,"priority_support":false}', 1, 1, NOW()),
('الباقة الاحترافية', 'Professional Plan', 'باقة شاملة للأعمال المتنامية مع ميزات متقدمة', 'Comprehensive package for growing businesses with advanced features', 299, 'monthly', 500, 5000, '{"whatsapp_integration":true,"ai_responses":true,"basic_analytics":true,"advanced_analytics":true,"product_management":true,"order_management":true,"campaign_management":true,"customer_support":"priority_email","custom_branding":true,"api_access":true,"priority_support":false,"google_calendar":true,"google_sheets":true,"loyalty_program":true}', 1, 2, NOW()),
('باقة المؤسسات', 'Enterprise Plan', 'حل متكامل للمؤسسات الكبيرة مع دعم مخصص وإمكانيات غير محدودة', 'Complete solution for large enterprises with dedicated support and unlimited capabilities', 999, 'monthly', -1, -1, '{"whatsapp_integration":true,"ai_responses":true,"basic_analytics":true,"advanced_analytics":true,"product_management":true,"order_management":true,"campaign_management":true,"customer_support":"24_7_phone","custom_branding":true,"api_access":true,"priority_support":true,"google_calendar":true,"google_sheets":true,"loyalty_program":true,"white_label":true,"dedicated_account_manager":true,"custom_integrations":true,"sla_guarantee":true}', 1, 3, NOW());
